about_the_game:
"Seekers of Darkness" is a deck-building roguelike card battle RPG that combines a wide range of strategies with thrilling card battles.
Enjoy a heart-pounding new gaming experience with elements of tower defense RTS!

"This is the game I've been wanting to play"
With this motto, we've implemented a unique combat system. Forge your own original strategy and plunge into the depths of the dungeon. With over 70 unique cards, the possibilities are endless!

Complete in-game missions to unlock new cards and characters!

  • A priest who wields spells of fire and stone from a distance
  • A versatile mercenary skilled with a razor-sharp sword and paralyzing axe
  • A warrior who sacrifices their health to unleash powerful attacks
  • A scholar who chants ancient curses to weaken foes and summons magical boomerangs with special effects
Who will you choose to conquer the dark dungeons with?


The combination of cards and characters is crucial. Build a deck that complements your playstyle and chosen character!
Will you incinerate enemies with fire, immobilize them with lightning, overpower them with weapons, or summon familiars? Use unique spells to create a battlefield that tips the scales in your favor. The choice is yours!

"Seekers of Darkness" also supports the ranking system! Compete with players worldwide to see who can reach the deepest parts of the labyrinth. Enhance your attack power, shield yourself from enemy strikes, cast powerful spells that require significant energy, and clear out foes in various ways. The strategies are limitless, and the card battles and deck-building are incredibly fun!

We've crafted such a game for you. Enjoy!

short_description: Dive into "Seekers of Darkness," a thrilling deck-building roguelike RPG with intense card battles and tower defense RTS elements. Unlock powerful characters, build unique strategies with over 70 cards, and compete in offline rankings. Burn enemies, freeze them, or overpower with weapons. Enjoy!!
